price: Qindiin (maleeyakaan) isaa ni jedha: “kun waan (galmaa’ee) na bira dhihaataa tahee jiruudha.”
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
